name: natural-paths
title: Natural Paths
author: OnigiriOni
description:
While driving and to a lesser extend walking, the soil will degrade and form natural paths. Over time it will regenerate to its original form.

Features different behaviour for walking and driving and a dynamically calculated regeneration path.

This mod is still in beta and might have bugs. Until full release, updates may break the regeneration process so take a look at the changelog.
